Posts.Content: Don't you feel so much in control??? I ordered several head coverings from headcovers.com scarves, bandannas, beanies to sleep in, and of course I have wigs. I use a gentle scalp shampoo that I bought at a hair salon. Don't really know if it makes a difference but it smells good!!!! Best of luck to you. It is a bumpy road but it does smooth out!!!
Posts.Title: I am BALD BABY!?!
